column4: i'm using ubuntu under vmware in windows xp to run an ircd, i can't start it though cause i need to open my router ports, but how do i open router ports for a virtual machine's address?
what's a  ircd?   also you might want to try #vmware
it's the server to host an irc network
if you got a hardware firewall  your ports are open for  your host OS as well as the guest as  far as I know.   if   your doing software I guess ports can be open for just the vm.
